page.title: 08THE SHOP IN PLYMTREE
page.content: The Shop is in the centre of the village. It is a house, with the front downstairs room turned into a shop. It has a very small garden at the front, with plants for sale in it. It is a very small shop, but the owners manage to fit a lot in it. It has a Post Office counter, and a counter for food. The shopkeepers get up at 0700, sort out the shop, and the money for the Post Office. Then, they have brekfast, and milk and bread are delivered to be sold. The Shop opens to customers at 0845. They check the shelves, to see if they are out of anything. If they are, then they order it from the warehouse.
